summary:
Changed The Apperiances Of 7 NPCs:
1. Adelaisa Vendicci
2. Adrianne Avenicci
3. Aela
4. Camilla Valerius
5. Carlotta Valentia
6. Lydia
7. Ysolda
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][B][COLOR=#ffffff]SMR - Revised NPC Version 1.1
(Previous version was packed in my mod Amaranthine which I'm making several changes to and won't have my revised npc's in future updates.)[/COLOR]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B]

[B][COLOR=#76923c]Credits and Thanks to:[/COLOR][/B]

[B][COLOR=#ff0000]DarkFox127[/COLOR] - For All His Amazing Tutorials (Youtube)[/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]Gabriel Mailhot[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/URL][/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]Apachii[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/URL] (Creator Has Granted Me Permission To Use His Work)[/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]DD AKT[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7897/?]Envision Face[/URL][/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]Alt3rn1ty[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/URL][/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]ECE team[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/URL][/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]Tiwa44[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/URL] (Creator Has Granted Everyone Permission To Use His Work)[/B]
[B][COLOR=#ff0000]Petrovich[/COLOR] - [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658/?]UNP Simply Clothes[/URL] (Creator Has Granted Everyone Permission To Use His Work)[/B]

[B]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B]

[B][COLOR=#ffffff]It's a standalone mod; all required files are included.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ffffff]Redone: Adelaisa Vendicci, Adrianne Avenicci, Aela, Camilla Valerius, Carlotta Valentia, Lydia And Ysolda[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ffffff]Changes in Version 1.1:
1. All characters have UNP based Body
2. Edited Lydia's class and combat style to make her more of a Tank, which works for me.
3. Edited Aela's combat style (She's still an archer but better ... I think lol.).
4. Replaced some footwear with simply boots (Link to mod is above).
5. Packed everything into a bsa file.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ffffff]Installation:
Use NMM it's easy enough.
This mod should be placed after any mod in your load order that alters these 7 Npcs or it will be overriden, the choice is yours really.
If you using Requiem then place this mod before Requiem and place the patch after both.[/B][/COLOR][/CENTER]


[CENTER][B]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2nRSy7H.jpg?1[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DNAvR1H.jpg?2[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8jYzeDc.jpg?1[/IMG][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/B][/CENTER]
author: smriaz

files.name: SMR - Revised NPC V1.1 (BSA Archive)
files.changelogHtml:
All characters have UNP based Body
Edited Lydia's class and combat style to make her more of a Tank, which works for me.
Edited Aela's combat style (She's still an archer but better ... I think lol).
Replaced some footwear with simply boots (Link to mod is above).
No loose files packed everything into a bsa file.
